EmailTemplate.name: SF Temp BAP Benefits Standalone
EmailTemplate.subject: SF Temp BAP Benefits Standalone
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email.
The LegalZoom Business Advantage Pro is a membership that gives you access to the following benefits:
• Attorney advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced attorney on an unlimited number of new legal matters • Tax professional advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced tax professional on an unlimited number of new tax issues • Attorney drafted letters. Your attorney can draft legal letters or on your behalf • Unlimited access to LegalZoom legal forms. Download hundreds of blank legal forms for business or personal use • 1 Free copyright per month, all you pay is the Federal filing fee • Access to CreditAlert Plus from Dun & Bradstreet Credibility Corp. Establish & monitor your Business Credit Profile. • 25% savings on additional attorney services. Get significant savings on additional attorney work if you need it • 20% savings on additional tax services. • 10% savings on any LegalZoom legal documents. Get any LegalZoom business or personal documents at a discount
If you have any questions or need further information, please call our Customer Care Team at 877.818.8787 Monday-Friday from 6:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. PT.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.CompanyName} {!User.Address} {!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
